Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Screen; Size; Battery Life; App Availablity; Easy To Customize; Operating System; WiFi; Web Browsing
I bought this product in order to get acquainted with I-pad technology and to get proficient with it for e-mail retrieval and for entertainment. I chose it for benefits to price. Once I became proficient with this one, I intended to purchase another one with more functions, HOWEVER, this item has proven to be the BEST ONE for my needs. It's easy to use, both on and off line. Loading apps is a breeze. Screen resolution is fine as is the sound. It's surprisingly quick in retrieving my e-mails and web browsing and the wifi is good.It's entertainment value is priceless. I watch Showtime movies and listen to local police and fire dispatch calls on it and play games on it as well. Th ... e size is great, it's sturdy, and versatile...every time I use it, I find something else it will do. The only thing I wish it had was the camera funtion, but for me , that's an option and not a need. This product fits my needs so perfectly that I don't need anything different !....It's truly a KEEPER !!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: recommend this for childs first tablet
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact; Easy to carry with me; Battery Life; WiFi
Cons: Slow response with apps; Poor touch movements; Slow moving pages; No charging button; No Camera; App availablity; Slow; Poor Software Bundle
After owning a better tablet I purchased this one to carry with me. The size is nice to put inside my purse and carry on me, otherwise it is a great disappointment. Would be perfect for a small child first tablet. My 4 year old likes it,9 year old gets bored with it quick,and my 30 year old things its junk. It does what it says it will do, but is slow moving, (not from the internet connect, which is good and works well on other devices I have.)When navigating the pages it is slow to move to the next screen. I almost took it back because I really dont like it for the price, bu ... t my 4 year old does so we keep it for a spare. Touch screen is hard to use also, does not respond well to touch, slow and laging. I would not have purcahsed if I had used it before buying it. Would not buy again expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; App Availablity; Easy To Customize; Screen
Cons: Web Browsing
I bought this as a first tablet for my 5 yr old to use so he would stop asking for my iPhone. It is slow, especially downloading, unless you add a memory card. It has tons of free apps. It is easy enough for the 5 yr old to work without help (he can read a little bit). We have had a couple of problems with apps not working properly once they are installed or not being supported by the publisher after a while. However, they are easy to remove if they stop working or if he loses interest in the app. Then, it's super easy to find new apps for him to play. Also, I'm not crazy about the way it displays web pages, but once you get used to it, it's fine. It does seem a little fragile, so I bought a ... good case and it's been just fine. I have recommended it to a couple of friends/family members. I do caution them that they will need to buy a decent size memory card and a good case with it though. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: WiFi; App Availablity; EReader; Operating System; Web Browsing; Screen
Cons: Virtual keyboard; Button Configuration; Speaker Quality; Battery Life
Excellent screen and not bad at all for simple mobile web browsing. Battery life not that good; bring your charger with you and get mobile car charger. For some reason comes on by itself and runs down the battery. I turn it all the way off when not using. Not a bad deal for the money.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Web Browsing; App Availablity; Easy To Customize; WiFi
Cons: Battery Life
Great portable unit. Priced right. PDF Quality not so good. Great ebook reader for the money Battery life with WiFi on is poor but it is after all an ereader and lasts all day in airplane mode. Needs a stand. Micro SD provides excellent expansion for video, MP3 and book storage. Very good video capability but plug it in as battery life is again an issue. Best tablet I have yet to test. Blackberry take note.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:

Cons: Speaker Quality
The kids love the tablets. Great for games and checking their school email.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Coby Kyros Tablet is just... OK.
Item.Review:
Pros: Inexpensive, nice size, sharp display screen, perfect e-reader
Cons: slow processor, resistive touch screen, only 4GB memory, not good for gaming
I purchased two of these for my 6 and 8 year old for Christmas. I have a Motorola Xoom and the love it. I was just concerned that my Xoom may get dropped so I wanted a cheaper alternative for them to play with and stay current with technology.
At $99, this Kyros tablet was a good value. It does NOT have Android market. It has alternatives ways to get apps, though. Keeping in mind that this tablet is more of an The performance is pretty slow. As an E-reader, it works perfectly. As a gaming device, it's pretty poor. It will load and play Angry Birds, but not Angry Birds Seasons or Angry Birds Rio. It will load and play mo ... st games that do not require a heavy processing power (lite games). It navigates through the web pretty well. They include an application for viewing youtube. This is good since, this model does not support flash.
The screen is a resistive touch screen. To best use it, you need to use the Stylus (one is provided). Memory is only 4GB, so to maximize performance, move installed programs to an SD card. This device will support up to a 32GB micro SD card.
The device came with a plastic screen protector. I'm sure it was not intended for use other than to protect it from shipping/packaging, but I'm still using it to protect the screen. It's pretty good!
It supports Wi-Fi, and it works OK. Not fantastic, but not unbearable, either.
For all you hackers out there, there are MODs to install Android Market. Just install the older one. There are also mods to install Flash, but your mileage may vary on this mod.
The kids are enjoying it, but I can see them quickly growing out of it. It was a value for the time that I purchased it, but in 6-9 months, I think my kids will get bored with it. It's just too slow. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Not 1 thing!
Cons: Everything Sucks!
This unit SHOULD NOT be sold through Best Buy! I have been a loyal Best Buy customer for several years and the purchase of this product makes me look elsewhere for my electronics. I had a friend looking for a tablet and he went to Best Buy and they advised him NOT to purchase the unit. I recommend that Best Buy listen to your employee's and don't sell a pure piece of JUNK. This unit freezes quite often. Takes a lite year to load anything. Won't open some items. Difficult to navigate. Battery life is very little. It is a PURE 0 in this buyers book!

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Cheap
Cons: very slow, short battery life, and much more
This tablet is horrible. The worst thing about it is that its agonizingly slow, 800mhz is not enough to run a 7 inch tablet smoothly. Every game that i download either loads forever or lags. If your using it to run apps then the battery will last about 2hrs if not 1. They claim that it has 4gb but ive only download 20 apps and it already says im out of memory. Lastly, it will take about 5 minutes for it to fully start up. Do me a favor and please Do Not Purchase this Tablet.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price.
Cons: Everything else.
I bought this for my wife. We tried to make it work but everything was just so much effort. The resistive touch screen was unresponsive and slow. Had to swipe two or three times to make anything work. Even that might have been worth the trouble if they had not hobbled the Android OS so much. Finally took it back to the store. I was happily surprised that they took it back and gave me a full refund (minus the restocking fee, of course).

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Everything
This showed up on my door step crushed in the shipping box. I looked at the UPS Driver like he was "CRAZY"! I called Best Buy and they told me to bring the tablet into the store and they would exchange it. Best Buy did their part but could not get me a replacement for a couple weeks. I paid for expidited service the first time so I declined and got my money back. The tablet is slow and needs a lot of upgrades ro keep up with todays standards. I suggest not bying this and spend your money on at least a Samsung Galaxy the money, time an d frustration you save in the long road will be well worth it. I would love to buy the Apple products but times are tuff and everything cost money including Gas.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Bought this for my 5 year old
Item.Review:
Pros: price
Cons: slow, not smooth with attached protective cover
This does what I want it to do. It was bought for my 5 year old, so I did not expect much for the $80 I paid. She can down load games and music just like she does on my Android phone, however, it does not have the Android Market, it has Getjar (I believe). My only problems with it, is that the finger does not slide very well with the protective cover it comes with (perhaps it works fine with a new one, but I have not yet purchased one) and that it is slow on loading sometimes. I would NOT purchase this for myself to use and expect it to be anywhere near the quality of an IPad or other expensive tablet.

Item.Review:
Pros: Web Browsing; Screen; Operating System; App Availablity; Easy To Customize; Battery Life; WiFi
Cons: Speaker Quality
I purchased this tablet for mobile credit card processing with Intuit Go Payment, only to find out Intuit's app was not compatible (it was a permission?? issue). My oldest son did some research, spent a few minutes with my tablet and BAM it works. I can now accept cards at my mobile locations without hauling my laptop around or dealing with the small screen of my Ipod. I love it!!!

I can't believe that some people rate this as a good tablet that was the reason I purchased it, because people recommend it when I was trying to find something for my kids, but how wrong they are I wish I would of NEVER GOT THIS.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Average device, but good if in the right hands
Item.Review:
Pros: price, Android OS
Cons: touchscreen response, sound volume
This device can be a good and affordable option for someone who really understands what they are doing, but a pain if you do not. The user should be willing to work with the limitations and know how to work around them to have a positive experience.
Positive qualities: Affordable compared to an iPad or Galaxy Tab. Fair/reasonable screen display. Appreciated the additional USB connection (female) included in the box. Appreciated the Android operating system and the ability to "truly" manage the device.
Negative Qualities: Touch screen is a little frustrating and not as convenient as an iPad or Galaxy Tab. Does not come with the Android Marketplace installed Sound quality is fair ... , but the volume at highest is lacking. After installing Android Marketplace there are several mainstream Apps that are not compatible. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review: I first went to hhgregg to buy the pandigital model R70G100 tablet, but I found out they were discontinuted. So, instead, I bought the Kyros. It's not too bad if you're a first time user for a tablet. However, It was way too slow for my taste. I wasn't too happy about the lagging of it either. You're better off using your android phone instead. (hence the term 'android tablet'.) I will be returning it tomorrow.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price, easy to navigate
Cons: Took some time to read and find information to get work-a-arounds (i.e. getting android apps) it was worth it
I read A LOT of reviews and comparisons before I purchased a tablet for my 7 year old for Christmas. I didn't want to spend a lot of money but wanted something for her to be able to run some apps and watch movies in the car and while traveling. She is used to playing on a DSI and on iPods and an iPhone. Some of the reviews did concern me about this tablet but I found A LOT of information about work-a-rounds to make this into a great little tablet! While it does not have Android market directly on it I went to getjar.com and got her favorite games like Angry Birds and it ran with no problems at all. Yes it is a little slow to st ... art the tablet up and the games are not as fast as on the iPhone or iPod but I wasn't looking for the cost of a an iPad either at the age of 7! It does not have Adobe Flash Player BUT I found a GREAT DVD converter program DVD Catalyst and with a little bit of tech support from them got the right specs to convert movies to run on the tablet. I did put in a 16G micro memory card to run the movies and quality is just fine. Summary if you do some reading of other reviews and find the right information to get this tablet going it is a good little machine to start with. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review: This product didn't charge..I bought 2 and both had the same problem..When returning the product was told having problems with them and got gift cards I would have prefered my money back..Or a replacement tablet.. This was my first time buying from Best buy and probably my last..quality of products bad...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Very good for the price; know what you are getting
Item.Review:
Pros: Value:price, ease, it is what it said it was
Cons: Inconsistent loading, lack of features may not be for you
I ordered this at the Black Friday pricing after having read professional reviews from respected review sites. I read the specs carefully and knew it didn't have a camera, Android Market (there is a workaround), or a capacitive screen. Really, I wasn't expecting much but wanted an entry-level tablet to consider its productivity uses. I was surprised at how well it performed, and I had me 16-yr-old son play with it to put it through better paces than I could. *Web page loading was inconsistent...sometimes very quick and sometimes slower, depending on where we were and time of day. So is it a connectivity issue or tablet issue? Not sure I can comment accurately, ... but the drag wasn't program or app-specific. *The screen was clear and responsive to my finger(nail) as well as the stylus when pressing, but inconsistent with my fingers when swiping. * There were lots of apps available and downloaded quickly. Setting up all of my Google accounts was quick and easy to sync.
But, much to 16's chagrin, I returned it. This was a decision against a tablet in general, not this tablet specifically. It didn't help my business productivity...it really duplicated things I do on my cell phone and laptop, and I need the additional functionality of both of those tools. I confess to struggling with adapting to no keyboard. Overall, it was better than I expected and a good starter tablet, especially for under $90. I recommend it to anyone who has a use for a tablet that can live with the specs as described. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing.
Cons: everything.
Got 2 of these Black Friday for a steal....got them home, garbage. They are not very responsive, screen is average at best....just not worth buying- even at a steal. Go with the Kindle Fire, it's awesome!

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; WiFi; Sturdy Build
Cons: Difficult To Customize; Battery Life; Button Configuration; Speaker Quality
I bought this tablet this morning for [$] and will be returning it promptly tomorrow morning. With no way to install the Android App Market, things like facebook and skype are 100% impossible.After 9 hours of trying to work around its limitations, i have to say, this product is only appealing to kids 10 and under.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; Web Browsing; Screen; App Availablity
Cons: Battery Life
Just had got the coby best [$] spent both me an my girlfriend got one good on angry birds an other apps easy enough to custmize good for the good for movies an social networking on the down side kinda slow when to many apps are running so good to invest in a task killer other than that good tablet

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:
I bought this tablet for myself because of the ereader and my wanting to be able to surf the web and check emails on the go, I was very surprised the how much more than that it is capable of!
I actually bought a capacitive touch screen tablet for a gift - it had claims of it being able to do more than the Kyros for $100 more than I spent on this tablet and am returning the other one to buy another Kyros, because this one is way more value for the money! The person I gifted the other tablet to actually played with my Kyros and asked that I get them that one instead!
Of course it's not an Ipad and you cannot get rid of your computer for it, but you really cannot ask for more out of an android tablet! This one is incredibly user-friendly, surprisingly quick, and has ample space ... and a slot for a mini SD card to expand the memory.
The only downfall ---- No Netflix.
I would 100% recommend this to a friend! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7012 4 GB
Item.Review:

Cons: touchscreen, can't download apps, slow to load webpages
It's slow to load webpages, can't download any apps from Android Market, touchscreen only responds well to the stylus and not fingertips, no place to put the stylus to keep it with the tablet, all around the only good thing about it was the price, but that doesn't even matter if it won't work! Was going to be a gift for someone just starting out with a tablet, but I don't feel comfortable that it would work for them.
